  12. class DocumentCategory(models.Model):
  13. """
  14. Documents can be grouped in categories.
  16. See ``DocumentCategoryTitle`` for translateable fields.
  18. :creation_date: The DateTime when this category was created.
  20. """
  21. creation_date = models.DateTimeField(
  22. auto_now_add=True,
  23. verbose_name=_('Creation date'),
  24. )
  26. slug = models.SlugField(
  27. max_length=32,
  28. verbose_name=_('Slug'),
  29. )
  31. def __unicode__(self):
  32. return self.get_title()
  34. def get_title(self):
  35. lang = get_language()
  36. return get_preferred_translation_from_lang(self, lang).title

  59. class DocumentManager(models.Manager):
  60. """Custom manager for the ``Document`` model."""
  61. def published(self, request):
  62. """
  63. Returns the published documents in the current language.
  65. :param request: A Request instance.
  67. """
  68. qs = self.get_query_set()
  69. qs = qs.filter(is_published=True)
  70. qs = filter_queryset_language(request, qs)
  71. return qs
  74. class Document(models.Model):
  75. """
  76. A document consists of a title and description and a number of filer-files.
  78. See ``DocumentTitle`` for the translateable fields of this model.
  80. :creation_date: DateTime when this document was created.
  81. :user: Optional FK to the User who created this document.
  82. :position: If you want to order the documents other than by creation date,
  83. enter numbers for positioning here.
  84. :is_published: If ``False`` the object will be excluded from the library
  85. views.
  86. :is_on_front_page: If ``True`` the object will be returned by the
  87. ``get_frontpage_documents`` templatetag.
  89. """
  90. category = models.ForeignKey(
  91. DocumentCategory,
  92. verbose_name=_('Category'),
  93. null=True, blank=True,
  94. )
  96. creation_date = models.DateTimeField(
  97. auto_now_add=True,
  98. verbose_name=_('Creation date'),
  99. )
  101. user = models.ForeignKey(
  102. 'auth.User',
  103. verbose_name=_('User'),
  104. null=True, blank=True,
  105. )
  107. position = models.PositiveIntegerField(
  108. verbose_name=_('Position'),
  109. null=True, blank=True,
  110. )
  112. is_published = models.BooleanField(
  113. default=False,
  114. verbose_name=_('Is published'),
  115. )
  117. is_on_front_page = models.BooleanField(
  118. default=False,
  119. verbose_name=('Is on front page'),
  120. )
  122. source_url = models.URLField(
  123. verbose_name=_('Source URL'),
  124. help_text=_(
  125. 'Use this if you want to give credit for a downloadable file.'),
  126. blank=True,
  127. )
  129. download_url = models.URLField(
  130. verbose_name=_('Download URL'),
  131. help_text=_(
  132. 'Use this if you want to link to a file instead of self-hosting'
  133. ' it'),
  134. blank=True,
  135. )
  137. objects = DocumentManager()
  139. class Meta:
  140. ordering = ('position', '-creation_date', )
  142. def __unicode__(self):
  143. return self.get_title()
  145. def get_filetype(self):
  146. lang = get_language()
  147. title = get_preferred_translation_from_lang(self, lang)
  148. if title.filer_file:
  149. return title.filer_file.extension.upper()
  150. return None
  152. def get_title(self):
  153. lang = get_language()
  154. return get_preferred_translation_from_lang(self, lang).title
  157. class DocumentTitle(models.Model):
  158. """
  159. The translateable fields of the ``Document`` model.
  161. :title: The title of the document.
  162. :description: A short description of the document.
  163. :filer_file: FK to the File of the document version for this language.
  165. """
  166. title = models.CharField(
  167. max_length=512,
  168. verbose_name=_('Title'),
  169. )
  171. description = models.TextField(
  172. verbose_name=_('Description'),
  173. blank=True,
  174. )
  176. filer_file = FilerFileField(
  177. verbose_name=_('File'),
  178. null=True, blank=True,
  179. )
  181. copyright_notice = models.CharField(
  182. max_length=1024,
  183. verbose_name=_('Copyright notice'),
  184. blank=True,
  185. )
  187. # Needed by simple-translation
  188. document = models.ForeignKey(
  189. Document, verbose_name=_('Document'))
  191. language = models.CharField(
  192. max_length=5, verbose_name=('Language'), choices=settings.LANGUAGES)
